name: Shooter Prototype
description:
This was my first published game/prototype on itch.io a bit over a year ago, I recently decided to make it public again for anyone that wants to enjoy it or see how I started out. (Description updated 5/7/18)

In this simple arcade-style Shooter, you attempt to survive as many waves of enemies as you can. The game was started by following Sebastian Lague's "Create a Game Series" on YouTube.

  • WASD - Move 
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • R - Reload
